title: A Disturbing Development In The Vax Mandate Scandal (Ep 1644)
description:
Tyrant Biden makes his most aggressive move yet against civil liberties. In this episode I address the new developments. I also address the FBI’s bizarre raid on this conservative reporter. 

News Picks:


Pete Buttigieg is lying about “racist” roads.


The cat lady got booted from LinkedIn for harassment. What a tool. 

Is the cat lady defrauding people? 

Is the Biden administration making a list of gun owners to target?

Why is FBI investigating the theft of a diary?
